post.title: test
post.content: # 테스트~~ dkdkdkdk `xptmxm` dkdkdk + 빨강 + 녹색 + 녹색2 + 파랑 1. dd 2. ddd > 블록 인용 > > -- 123 ```javascript console.log("test") // this comment is here to demonstrate an extremely long line length, well beyond what you should probably allow in your own code, though sometimes you'll be highlighting code you can't refactor, which is unfortunate but should be handled gracefully ``` ## Table | a | b | c | d | | - | :- | -: | :-: | | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | | Syntax | Description | | ----------- | ----------- | | Header | Title | | Paragraph | Text | | Paragraph | Text | | Paragraph | Text | ```json { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Smith", "age": 25 } ``` ```python def myfunc(a=1) { return a + 2 } ```
